fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1491: Warlord will always spawn.
- If there are at least three members, there must be one of each subalignment. If there are only two, they must be of different subalignments.
- If the Warlord dies, a random member will become the Warlord. They'll revert to their previous role if the Warlord is revived.
- Upgrade: Warfleet roles have Upgrade attributes that permanently apply after the phase they are Upgraded by the Warlord.
- Factional chat
- Factional kill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Destroy your landfaring opposition, and conquer their territory as your own.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Destroy your landfaring opposition, and conquer their territory as your own.
